intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: ...I know what I must do. Ryoma! Withdraw your troops.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: You don't mean that, Corrin. You cannot possibly!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I'm sorry, Ryoma, but I will not fight for Hoshido.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: How can you say that?! Open your eyes! Can you not see how vile those Nohrians are? They're hateful fiends who wish to trample Hoshido! They killed our mother!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: It's not that simple... I know what the Nohrian kingdom has done to Hoshido is unforgivable... And I know now that these are not my brothers and sisters by birth... Yet even still, I must side with them. My heart won’t allow me to do otherwise.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: How can you fight alongside those monsters after what they did?! Now that you know of their sins, how can you possibly justify joining them? You are a prince/princess of Hoshido! You are my brother/sister! They are to blame for you not growing up with us as you were meant to. Do you truly mean to fight for those who stole you away?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Ryoma... My sorrow is beyond words. Still, I simply will not abandon the only family I have ever known.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: You did the right thing, Corrin. As you now know, you do not share the same bloodline as the rest of us. But it matters not. I have regarded you as family since I first laid eyes on you. I cannot express what it means to me that you've chosen to return to us. Father will be pleased with your decision as well.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Are you certain of that, Prince Xander? Surely you must know of King Garon's attempt to murder Corrin!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Explain yourself. Swiftly.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: There was an attack in our capital's square. The explosion came from Corrin's sword. If my mother hadn't sacrificed herself, he/she would be dead now. If King Garon truly cares, why did he risk Corrin's life just to hurt Hoshido?

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Is this true, Corrin?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: ...It is. But I still need to hear Father's side of the story. That's why I must return home right away. I must know the truth of this tragedy.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: I'm afraid that is not an option.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Arrrgh!

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Everyone! Attack Corrin! I will not allow you to return to Nohr until we've settled this on the battlefield.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Ryoma! Please don't do this!

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: If you are looking for forgiveness, you'll find none here. So you wish to side with Nohr? Then you must first defeat your true brother. It is your birthright to fight on my side. I cannot forgive the choice you've made. How dare you use the sacred Yato blade against your own kingdom! Perhaps it is a blessing Mother isn't here to witness your betrayal.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Stand down, prince of Hoshido. I will not allow you to cause any further harm to Corrin.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Order me around once more, and Nohr will lose two princes/a prince as well as a princess today. I will do what I must to awaken my brother/sister from the spell that binds him/her. You vile Nohrians have brainwashed him/her, and I will not rest until he/she is free!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: More false accusations. You know very well he/she chose this of his/her own free will. No matter the blood that courses through his/her veins, we are his/her true family. That will never change.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: I will not stand here and listen to your lies! Your heart knows only deceit and betrayal. Nohrians are notorious for their cruel and cowardly methods. This is no different. But enough of your foolish words. We must resolve this with blades.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: So be it. I always knew it would come to this. The crown prince of Nohr clashing blades with Hoshido’s heir. It’s almost poetic.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Please, stop this madness! Both of you! Xander, I beg of you. Let it go for now. We must return to Nohr right away. There has been enough senseless death on this day...

intro.speaker: Leo
intro.line: I'm afraid retreat is not an option.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Leo? Why would you say that?

intro.speaker: Leo
intro.line: If we retreat, they'll think we fear them. Or worse, that we coerced you into joining us. This is our chance to prove beyond a doubt that you chose us of your own volition. We have no choice but to stand our ground and fight!

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: I agree with Leo. After all, we've done nothing wrong. Why should we flee? You're one of us, Corrin. that's worth fighting for!

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Don't worry, Corrin! Everything's OK now that we're together again! If we all try our hardest, there's no way we can lose!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Is that really what you want? Leo, Camilla, even Elise...

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: If you mean to fight, then FIGHT! Nohrian pawns. Soon you shall be a mere stain on my sacred blade, Raijinto. Hinoka! Takumi! Sakura! Are you ready?

intro.speaker: Hinoka
intro.line: Ready and waiting! Like I'd ever let them take Corrin away from us again.

intro.speaker: Takumi
intro.line: Show no mercy. Now is our chance to avenge Mother's death!

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: I'll help too. I'll do my b-best! Please, Corrin, come back to us...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Fools, all of you. You have my pity. Sadly for you, my sacred blade, Siegfried, knows nothing of pity—only triumph. Camilla! Leo! Elise! prepare for battle!

intro.speaker: Camilla
intro.line: I swear to protect our dear Corrin no matter what!

intro.speaker: Leo
intro.line: Failure is no option. Let's show those scoundrels what it means to be a family!

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: I'm ready too! Let's finish this quickly, though. I'm starving!

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: This is it... ATTACK!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: It begins!

boss.speaker: Sakura
boss.line: I don't care what happens to me, but I w-won't let you hurt the people I love!

boss.speaker: Sakura
boss.line: I don't...understand...

boss.speaker: Hinoka
boss.line: I won't rest until Corrin returns home. I've been training for this day!

boss.speaker: Hinoka
boss.line: How could this happen?! What have I been fighting for all this time...?

boss.speaker: Takumi
boss.line: Prepare to pay for what you monsters have done. This is for Mother!

boss.speaker: Takumi
boss.line: Gah! You may not have honor, but you certainly have skill. This isn't over...

boss.speaker: Ryoma
boss.line: I will not allow a filthy Nohrian to sully my honor!

boss.speaker: Ryoma
boss.line: Damn! I'll have to withdraw for now... This isn't over, Corrin!

boss.speaker: Yukimura
boss.line: This battle is truly lamentable. It would have broken Lady Mikoto's heart to watch these events unfold...

boss.speaker: Yukimura
boss.line: I must withdraw... Forgive me, Lady Mikoto...

boss.speaker: Sakura
boss.line: Corrin! Are you r-really gonna fight me right now? What did I ever do to you? All I wanted was to l-love you!

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Sakura, I'm so sorry for all this. You didn't do anything wrong, I promise. It's difficult to explain, but I just need you to...um, take a little nap right now.

boss.speaker: Sakura
boss.line: Brother/Sister, no...

boss.speaker: Hinoka
boss.line: What exactly do you think you're doing, Corrin?! Betraying us for Nohr... It just can't be true! They must have tricked you somehow, right?

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: I'm sorry, Hinoka. I just... I can't abandon the ones I loved all these years. It's as simple as that.

boss.speaker: Hinoka
boss.line: Corrin... Say it isn't so...

boss.speaker: Takumi
boss.line: Hmph. I knew it would come to this. From the moment we met, I knew you couldn't be trusted. And I was right.

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Takumi... Please, let me explain.

boss.speaker: Takumi
boss.line: I have no time for your empty words. Ryoma and the others were fools. I knew trusting a Nohrian would only lead to death and heartbreak. But I am not Ryoma, nor my siblings. I won't make that same mistake. I shall take great joy in slaying you here and now like the traitor you are!

boss.speaker: Ryoma
boss.line: Corrin! Do not allow them to fool you a moment longer. There's still time... Come back to your true family, where you belong!

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: I'm sorry, Ryoma. I'm afraid that's not possible. I've made up my mind. I'm staying with Xander and my Nohrian siblings.

boss.speaker: Ryoma
boss.line: Very well. Although it pains me, I see you cannot be dissuaded. In that case, I have no choice but to drag you back to Hoshido by force!

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Ryoma! Don't do this!!

boss.speaker: Yukimura
boss.line: So, here we are. You have come back to us, but with a blade in hand. I suppose it's safe to surmise you have no intention of returning to Hoshido?

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: You are correct. Nohr is my home. It's where I belong.

boss.speaker: Yukimura
boss.line: How very upsetting. If Lady Mikoto were here to see this, it would break her heart. Then again, she may just have smiled and said, "It's his/her path to choose."

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Yukimura...

boss.speaker: Yukimura
boss.line: But such talk is pointless, for our dear queen has left this realm. As for myself, I am above all a tactician for the honorable Hoshidan army. As such, I am obligated to prevent you from returning to Nohr!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Ryoma… Everyone… Please find it in your hearts to forgive me. I know that a prince/princess of Hoshido siding with Nohr seems like the ultimate betrayal. But I swear on my honor…I will end this war, for all of us. For Nohr and Hoshido—for you and me. I promise you that. Until then…farewell.

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: Are you sure about this, Corrin? Once done, it cannot be undone.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Yes, I know. But it's the only way. These people, I've loved them for as long as I can remember. They are my family.

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: I see. If that is the path you have chosen, I will not try to stop you. I am certain we will meet again. But for now... I suppose this is good-bye.
